title: Murad targeted for being middle class political worker: Farrukh
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 17 (APP): Minister of State for Information and Broadcasting Farrukh Habib said on Thursday Minister for Communication Murad Saeed was targeted for belonging to a middle class family, who  came to the politics from the grassroots level.
The minister, in a tweet, said he and Murad worked together as Insaf Students Federation (ISF) members to mobilize the youth across the country for a ‘New Pakistan’.
The young man [Murad] proved himself by demonstrating political and administrative ability and came to prominence due to his performance, he added.
